1.0.name: wordpress/beeline
1.0.description:
Own the search. Enrich your readers.

*** Beeline BETA is Here! Go ahead, give it a try! ***

Many websites lose a great deal of their visitors to major search engines, and other websites, offering information related to what they write about. Beeline's WordPress plugin reverses this common search pattern by accurately predicting what your readers would want to search for. Beeline brings search results into YOUR page without disrupting any of your content and layout. And its totally free!

What's in it for YOU

  1. Extremely accurate results Due to our unique ability to automatically create the best search queries for your text.
  2. Your readers never leave Let your readers keep reading YOUR page, while enjoying additional content.
  3. Sleek & intuitive User Interface It's simple. It's snazzy. It's a cool little in-text related-articles brow
